---
title: "Dirichlet distribution"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(DirichletReg)

n <- 200
```

```{r}
xs <- rdirichlet(n, c(1,1,1))
pdf("../figures/dirichlet_distribution_1.pdf")
plot(DR_data(xs),
     a2d = list(colored = TRUE),
     dim.labels=c(expression(p[1]),expression(p[2]),expression(p[3])), cex=2)
dev.off()
```
